attributes.action: Increase the number of troops in Iraq.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the signers of this petition feel it is better to see a stable iraq now rather than see a country taken over by fundementalists and terrorists. A country in which we be forced to confront and which will likely demand a much greater cost in human lives. Depspite the reasons for entering the war we have a responsibility to the people of Iraq once we entered the country.
